column58: Any other comments you would like to make to ensure cost escalation is eliminated or reduced by using D&B Procurement System in roadworks in Tanzania:
since design liability will be shifted  to contactor there is possibility of minimising the change of scope of works hence reduce cost and time overruns of the Project.

Design and Built in TANZANIA is now necessary especially as we are planning for economical reform program which will involve mult billions projects like Standard Gauge project, tunnelling projects, Stigla Gauge project etc that obvious agree to this method. These complex projects are easly be done on D&B as the challenges are noted first, discussed and solved, thereafter implemented.

As it is in the conventional procurement method where we have Construction Supervision Consultants, we should have D&B Supervision Consultants who will supervise the design and later construction or design and construction concurrently.

inclusion of value engineering parameters by putting bonus clause sharing ratio for any saving D&B contractor will create during project execution. E.g for any identified saving items, client may be rewarded 65% and D&B contractor 35%
Nil

In D&B design and construction details are being developed throughout the entire process and the focus stays on owner to obtain value of his money.  The communication benefits of working with a design professional and a construction expert at the same time ensures that potential problems are discovered before the project starts. On the other hand construction can start earlier, reducing the overall project delivery time - from inception to completion
One of the major advantage of D&B is that the Client has one organisation to deal with â€“ i.e. one point of responsibility once the design and build contract is awarded
Stakeholders to be very familiar with the delivery method of D & B and not to contradict to other method like TPM
Local services providers such as contractors & consultant should be trained about D&B contracting systems
PROPER SELECTION OF COMPETENT CONTRACTORS & CORRUPTION FREE
Tendency of ownership of the project by the contractor increases hence marginal profit to the contractor ensured.
non
Performance specification should be clear and limited, also integrity as the source of communication is one, so easy to be compromised
There is the lack of qualified professionals on the Employer's side to clearly prepare the Employers proposal, by improving this key areas D&B Procurement will excel as expected
Design and build is the solution for construction problem
Quickly delivery due to contractor' responsibility on materials outsourcing

For D&B Procurement System to effectively control cost the Client should be very precise on his requirements (Employer's Requirements). Any Change in Employer's Requirements will lead to shooting up of cost, and that is when the Contractor makes his profit.
Engaged Contractors which has enough capital and experiences in D&B works.
CONTROL THE VARIATION AND ADDITION WORK
Overseeing of sub-contractors performance rests soley on the Main Contractor in D&B Procurement System and hence all liabilities and risks lay on the Main Contractor.
